ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 80 SMs x 64 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 10,240 FP64 ops/clock (1:1 ratio with FP32)
ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 80 SMs x 64 CUDA cores/SM x 2 (FMA) = 10,240 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 80 SMs x 8 Tensor Cores/SM x 256 ops/TC/clock = 163,840 FP16 ops/clock (1st gen TC)
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 80 SMs x 8 Tensor Cores/SM x 256 ops/TC/clock = 163,840 INT8 ops/clock (same as FP16, 1st gen TC)

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (1530 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: Volta architecture. First GPU with Tensor Cores (1st gen, 8 per SM). 80 SMs with 64 CUDA cores each. 32GB HBM2 at 900 GB/s. FP64 at 1:1 ratio (HPC-class). No BF16/TF32 support (pre-Ampere).
